text: Elm Creek is a stream in Fall River and Custer counties, South Dakota, in the United States. It is a tributary of the Cheyenne River. Elm Creek was named for the elm trees along its banks. ==See also== *List of rivers of South Dakota ==References== Category:Rivers of Custer County, South Dakota Category:Rivers of Fall River County, South Dakota Category:Rivers of South Dakota
title: Elm Creek (Cheyenne River tributary)
